properties.article_title: Worrying pressure on SA’s fish stocks
properties.article_description: The Status of the South African Marine Fishery Resources 2014 report, released by Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries Minister Senzeni Zokwana to mark World Oceans Day assessed the 49 fish stocks that are managed by the Fisheries Department.  Half of the commercially exploited fish stocks in South Africa are heavily overfished.
properties.primary_event: The Status of the South African Marine Fishery Resources 2014 report, was released by Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries Minister Senzeni Zokwana to mark World Oceans Day.
